title: 626 - Happy Pucks | Macy's Parade Recap
description:
Join Ray, Tommen, Mikey, The Gregger and Bernie the Butterfly for a recap of the parade. (story at about 18:34)

Make sure to listen to "The Bright Sessions” by Lauren Shippen http://www.thebrightsessions.com/

Thanks to all the listeners who barter pizzas and coffees for a month a good sleep by becoming patrons @ http://www.sleepwithmepodcast.com/patron
